meanings.definition: The ability to do something successfully or efficiently.
meanings.sent1: Her competences in math helped her solve the problem quickly.
meanings.sent2: The job requires a certain level of competences in computer programming.
meanings.sent3: His competences in cooking are so good that he can make a delicious meal out of anything.
meanings.sent4: Her competences in negotiation are like a superpower in getting what she wants.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter's competences in handling emergencies saved many lives.

meanings.definition: The knowledge and skills required to perform a task or job.
meanings.sent1: His competences in carpentry make him the best person to fix the broken chair.
meanings.sent2: The new employee needs to develop competences in customer service to excel in the role.
meanings.sent3: The cat's competences in catching mice are unmatched in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her competences in time management are the key to her success in balancing work and family.
meanings.sent5: The artist's competences in painting bring life to every canvas.
